title: OrgTxExecutionFailed Event v1.0
description: Emitted when a multi-signature transaction fails to execute despite having required approvals. Common causes: insufficient balance, frozen account, or system errors.

eventId.description: Unique identifier for this event instance

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

blockNumber.description: Fabric block number where this transaction was committed

chaincodeName.description: Name of the chaincode that emitted this event

payload.description: Multi-sig transaction execution failure data from chaincode

pendingTxID.description: Unique identifier for the pending multi-sig transaction

orgID.description: Organization ID that initiated the transaction

error.description: Error message describing why the transaction failed
